name: Voodoocide
description:
OBJECTIVE: Kill enemies for points, exit stage right to progress

How to kill enemies:
1) Accquire bloodstones
2) shoot enemy with bloodstone
3) KILL YOURSELF ( before the hourglass empties, or else you LOSE! )

Thats it, just a fun little suicide -as-homicide concept I cooked up, glitchy and incomplete but enough going on to get the idea. Have fun!
